data.meanings: to be few in number, small in quantity, rare. qalilun - few, little, small, rare, seldom. aqall - fewer, poorer. qallala - to appear as few.
data.sentence: The word قَلِيلًا comes from the root ق ل ل and is associated with the meanings: to be few in number, small in quantity, rare. qalilun - few, little, small, rare, seldom. aqall - fewer, poorer. qallala - to appear as few.

data.meanings: to take, receive. ataun - gift bestowment, present. a'ta - to give a present, offer. ta'ata (vb. 6) - took.
data.sentence: The word وَأَعْطَى comes from the root ع ط و and is associated with the meanings: to take, receive. ataun - gift bestowment, present. a'ta - to give a present, offer. ta'ata (vb. 6) - took.

data.meanings: To restrain, detain, give little, stop hand, be niggardly.
data.sentence: The word وَأَكْدَى comes from the root ك د ي and is associated with the meanings: To restrain, detain, give little, stop hand, be niggardly.
